metadata.title: CVE-2019-6292 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in singledocparser.cpp in yaml-cpp (aka LibYaml-C++) 0.6.2. Stack Exhaustion occurs in YAML::SingleDocParser, and there is a stack consumption problem caused by recursive stack frames: HandleCompactMap, HandleMap, HandleFlowSequence, HandleSequence, HandleNode. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a cpp file.

criterions.comment: yaml-cpp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.3-9').
